2024 tournament

Locations, dates:

• Selection show: Monday, March 4, 10 a.m. ET, NCAA.com

• First round: Campus sites, March 9

• Quarterfinals: Campus sites, March 16

• Semifinals, finals: Koeppel Community Center, Hartford, Conn., March 21 and 23

Qualifying teams: 13

Format: The winners of five first-round games advance to play at the three teams that earned byes to the quarterfinals. All rounds are single elimination.

Automatic qualifiers:

• Pool A: Nine postseason tournament champions — from CCC, MASCAC, MIAC, NEHC, NESCAC, NCHA, SUNYAC, UCHC and WIAC

• Pool C: Four institutions from automatic-qualifying conferences that are not their conference champions and teams from conference that don’t have an automatic qualifier

NCAA Division III men’s ice hockey committee

• Katie Boldvich, NEHC commissioner (chair)

• Danielle Harris, WIAC commissioner

• Tyler Hynes, WIlkes coach

• Graham Johnson, Milwaukee School of Engineering coach

Future sites

2025

Championship played at campus site

2026

• Championship: Adirondack Bank Center at the Utica Memorial Auditorium, Utica, N.Y.
